My story.

My programming journey started in 2017 in Russia, when I was 14 years old. In my school's IT classes we started coding in Pascal.
That was my first dive into algorythms and programming fundamentals, and I absolutely loved it.

Then I signed up for extra classes, where I later started coding in Python and Java.

When it was time to choose a university, I decided to major in Computer Science.
Unfortunately, I studied only for two semesters and then had to immigrate to Argentina.

But I didn't give up on my dream of working in IT! I chose to focus on web development, specifically frontend.

Javascript, ReactJS, HTML5 and CSS3 were my priority, and I have been self-teaching ever since.

My tools and technologies.

JavaScript
ReactJS
Tailwind CSS
Sass

HTML5

My projects.

Omnifood

Developed a simple, yet modern, commercial website. It is a small business dedicated to promote healthy eating and to provide various diet plans for every customer. The whole website is responsive and follows SEO and accessibility best practices.
